short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to hide only some of yours or opponents pieces and play the game partially blindfolded.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play blindfolded games on Lichess. If you can't handle not seeing all the pieces, you can hide only some of them.
